[Home](./index.md) &gt; [clm-core](./clm-core.md) &gt; [BaseModelController](./clm-core.basemodelcontroller.md)

## BaseModelController class

A controller which offers CRUD opeartions as REST-Interface on a certain resource. Expects as types `DAO` which has to be of type [BaseDAO](./clm-core.basedao.md)<!-- -->, `Datamodel` of type [BaseDatamodel](./clm-core.basedatamodel.md) and `FDTO` of type [BaseFrontendDTO](./clm-core.basefrontenddto.md)

<b>Signature:</b>

```typescript
export declare class BaseModelController<DAO extends BaseDAO<Datamodel>, Datamodel extends BaseDatamodel, FDTO extends BaseFrontendDTO> 
```

## Remarks

This class is to be extended by your custom resources.

## Constructors

|  Constructor | Modifiers | Description |
|  --- | --- | --- |
|  [(constructor)(dao, modelClass, dtoClass)](./clm-core.basemodelcontroller._constructor_.md) |  | Constructs a new instance of the <code>BaseModelController</code> class |

## Properties

|  Property | Modifiers | Type | Description |
|  --- | --- | --- | --- |
|  [activateStandardRouting](./clm-core.basemodelcontroller.activatestandardrouting.md) |  | () =&gt; void | <p>Activates the standard CRUD operations on a resource. The following convention is assumed:</p><p>GET / - find all resources</p><p>POST / - create a resource</p><p>GET /:id - find a specific resource by id</p><p>PATCH /:id - update a specific resource by id</p><p>PUT /:id - update a specific resource by id</p><p>DELETE /:id - delete a specific resource by id</p> |
|  [dao](./clm-core.basemodelcontroller.dao.md) |  | DAO | DAO which extends [BaseDAO](./clm-core.basedao.md) |
|  [dtoClass](./clm-core.basemodelcontroller.dtoclass.md) |  | new (params: any) =&gt; FDTO | The frontend DTO class which extends [BaseFrontendDTO](./clm-core.basefrontenddto.md)<!-- -->. It is used to only show a subset of attributes when fetching for resources |
|  [modelClass](./clm-core.basemodelcontroller.modelclass.md) |  | new (params: any) =&gt; Datamodel | The datamodel-class which extends [BaseDatamodel](./clm-core.basedatamodel.md) |
|  [router](./clm-core.basemodelcontroller.router.md) |  | express.Router | Express-Router to add custom handlers to the standard available routes. Handlers have to be registered before [BaseModelController.activateStandardRouting](./clm-core.basemodelcontroller.activatestandardrouting.md) has been called. |

## Methods

|  Method | Modifiers | Description |
|  --- | --- | --- |
|  [createDocument(preback, callback)](./clm-core.basemodelcontroller.createdocument.md) |  | Create a specific resource. Can be overwritten by extended classes |
|  [deleteOneDocument(preback, callback)](./clm-core.basemodelcontroller.deleteonedocument.md) |  | Delete a specific resource. Can be overwritten by extended classes |
|  [findAllDocuments(preback, callback)](./clm-core.basemodelcontroller.findalldocuments.md) |  | Find all resources. Can be overwritten by extended classes |
|  [findOneById(preback, callback)](./clm-core.basemodelcontroller.findonebyid.md) |  | Find a specific resource. Can be overwritten by extended classes |
|  [removeRoute(path, methods)](./clm-core.basemodelcontroller.removeroute.md) |  | Deletes a route |
|  [updateOneDocument(preback, callback)](./clm-core.basemodelcontroller.updateonedocument.md) |  | Update a specific resource. Can be overwritten by extended classes |
